responses: Hello! How can I help you?
Good day! What can I do for you today?

patterns: i feel sick and need a diagnose
can you tell me which disease i have?
responses: I can give you a diagnose. Please tell me all of your symptoms.
Please tell me all of your symptoms.
How sick do you feel? Which symptoms do you have? Please list all of them!
According to your described symptoms your diagnose is: a cold. Most of the time it is harmless, but please still consider visiting a doctor if it is going to be worse!
The diagnose is: a cold. Most of the time it is harmless, but please still consider visiting a doctor if it is going to be worse!

patterns: i have a cold. tell me more about it.
responses: The common cold is a viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract). It's usually harmless, although it might not feel that way. Many types of viruses can cause a common cold.
